title: Can't connect to games
body:
For the past two days, I've had extreme trouble getting into games.  I get a black screen and the "Can't connect to game" popup where I can retry or cancel.  Once everyone else is loaded in, I can finally connect.

And now, I don't know if the ongoing maintenance is exacerbating it or what, but I can't enter the game at all, and I've been trying for 15 minutes.

replies.body: There's been some maintenance going on, but that would impact everyone and not just yourself.  Your specific issue sounds like a connection problem that's failing to reach the game server, and the black screen can't download any assets.  You'll want to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
